summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue North, from East Lynn Street to East Montlake Place; and East Montlake Place, from 24th Avenue North to a connection with the existing pavement on Montlake Boulevard, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6446 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
